q2: Why did Germany have a disappointing year?
a2: Germany had a disappointing year because it did not reach the world cup
q3: What does Germany need to do to not disappoint again this year?
a3: Germany needs to use their strongest players to have a strong win record.
q4: you need to play more as a team and your players play faster and stronger
a4: That is a good philosophy for winning
